title: CSS Animated Grid Layouts
description: In CSS Grid, the grid-template-columns and grid-template-rows properties allow you to define line names and track sizing of grid columns and rows, respectively. Supporting interpolation for these properties allows grid layouts to smoothly transition between states, instead of snapping at the halfway point of an animation or transition.
author: Bramus

title: Building a tooltip component
description: A foundational overview of how to build a color-adaptive and accessible tooltip custom element.
author: Adam Argle

title: New patterns for amazing apps
description: Dive into a fantastic collection of new patterns for amazing apps, including clipboard patterns, file patterns, and advanced app patterns.
author: Thomas Steiner

title: New to the web platform in September
description: Discover some of the interesting features that landed in stable and beta web browsers during September 2022.
author: Jeremay Wagner

title: Speedy CSS Tip! Animated Loader
description: Let's make an animated CSS loader with scoped custom properties and animation-timing-function
author: Jhey Tompkins

title: Building the main navigation for a website
description: This tutorial describes how to build an accessible main navigation of a website. You learn about semantic HTML, accessibility, and how using ARIA attributes can sometimes do more harm than good.
author: Manuel MatuzoviÄ‡
